thread.title: Group Hopes Crowd-Sourcing Can Help Trump Build His Wall
thread.title_full: Group Hopes Crowd-Sourcing Can Help Trump Build His Wall

author: Jack Davis
title: Group Hopes Crowd-Sourcing Can Help Trump Build His Wall

organizations.name: group hopes crowd-sourcing can help trump build his wall group hopes crowd-sourcing can help trump build his wall

text:
Group Hopes Crowd-Sourcing Can Help Trump Build His Wall "This is...the REAL DEAL!" Share on Facebook Share Tweet Email Email Print Advertisement - story continues below 
President Donald Trump has said that Mexico will pay for the proposed wall along the U.S.-Mexico border — eventually. 
The president’s recent budget proposal says the American taxpayer will foot the bill for construction, although the Trump administration maintains that Mexico will still pay for the barrier in the end through trade deals. 
New there’s another option. Advertisement - story continues below 
A group called the America First Foundation Inc. is asking for private donations that can match government funding. You can now help President Trump build the wall… pic.twitter.com/Di6jZxFqRn 
— FOX & friends (@foxandfriends) March 23, 2017 
“Its finally here!! Now ALL Americans can go to America First Foundation, Inc. and can finally help directly fund The Great Southern Wall! This is not a joke, this is not a scam, this is the REAL DEAL! We just launched so bear with us,” the group announced last week on its Facebook page. Advertisement - story continues below #MAGA #Politics America First Foundation To Crowd-source Funds To Build Border Wall: The border wall… https://t.co/h53g121imF ⬅️See here⭐️ pic.twitter.com/iSi8HIeUkN 
— NewsRepublicans2016 (@NewsRepublicans) March 23, 2017 
“They are going to put up the wall. We’re just trying to help,” Steven Vulich, co-founder and vice president of America First Foundation, told The Daily Caller News Foundation. 
Vulich is an Army veteran who founded the America First Foundation as a way to bring Americans together for important causes, the border wall being one of them. Lets get the "Great Southern Wall" Funded. Let's show our support and be a part of American History Together! https://t.co/iAynWCscpF pic.twitter.com/BCCVbsMmdK 
— America First Found. (@americafrst) March 23, 2017 Advertisement - story continues below
